9PPQJBRB2KH0.description: Get ready to embark on a thrilling interstellar adventure with Spaceship Orbit Puzzle Game! Match four stone balls of the same color in each orbit by rotating them and advance to the next level. But be warned, the levels are full of surprises, including teleportation, different rotations, and other exciting elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

9NSKR4S8GWX0.title: Starship Space Game
9NSKR4S8GWX0.description: Get ready to embark on an epic space adventure with Starship Space Game! Take control of your own starship and engage in heart-pumping battles against enemy spaceships. Strategize your moves, collect bonuses, and keep your health intact as you navigate through the galaxy. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate space warrior? 9PD15N0V92JW.title: The Maze Baller
9PD15N0V92JW.description: Maze Baller - Minecraft Edition is a fun and challenging 3D puzzle game where you take control of a ball and navigate through a series of mazes. Each level presents a new challenge, with increasingly complex mazes that require careful planning and strategy to complete. The game is set in the Minecraft universe, adding a fun and colorful twist to the gameplay. As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter obstacles, enemies, and power-ups that will help you on your journey. One of the unique features of Maze Baller - Minecraft Edition is its dynamic level generation, which ensures that each play through is different and offers a new and exciting challenge. The game also features stunning 3D graphics and immersive sound effects, bringing the Minecraft world to life. With its addictive gameplay and challenging levels, Maze Baller - Minecraft Edition is sure to provide hours of fun for players of all ages and skill levels.

9N4DC7TSRH15.title: Neon Score Capture Action Spinner Gameplay
9N4DC7TSRH15.description: Neon Score Capture Action Spinner Gameplay is a thrilling game that combines reflexes, esports practice, puzzle-solving, and high score challenges. The game features a unique and mesmerizing neon visual style that is sure to catch your eye. In this game, your goal is to defeat your enemies by trapping them in your trail. The gameplay is fun, interactive, and addictive, and it is easy to learn but difficult to master. As you progress through the levels, the game becomes more challenging, and you will need to use your reflexes and strategy to succeed.

9NJMHFMFVQBM.title: Mahjong Pro Collection - Multiple Themes
9NJMHFMFVQBM.description: Mahjong Pro Collection - Multiple Themes is a fun and addictive puzzle game that challenges players to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board. With three beautiful themes (fruits, classic, modern) and six layouts of varying difficulty, players will never get bored of this game. The goal is to expose the tiles under the matched pairs for further play, and the game is won when all pairs have been removed from the board. The game also comes with hints and a helper guide for new players, an undo button in-game, and very smooth and interesting animations. This game is suitable for players of all ages and is perfect for anyone looking for a challenging and entertaining puzzle game.

In some levels, you'll control Super Cat directly as you jump, sit, move, climb, and shoot your way to victory. In others, you'll take control of a powerful spaceship and blast your enemies from afar. Collect power-ups and devour bugs to enhance your abilities and take on even tougher challenges.

9PKWGN52Z2MV.title: PDF Reader (pro)

One of the key features of PDF Reader is its search function, which allows you to quickly find specific words or phrases within a document. You can also choose between list view and book view, and switch between vertical and horizontal reading modes.

In addition, the app provides complete information about any PDF file you open, including its title, author, subject, and keywords. You can also zoom in and out of the document, use the hand tool to move around the page, and rotate the page if necessary.

"Tetris 3D" is a block puzzle but like you’ve never seen it before, an incredibly addictive and breathtakingly gorgeous remake of one of the most popular puzzle games of all time in a 3D graphical environment.

ENJOY :)

9N6WVKK980PM.title: The StoryTale (for Windows 10)
9N6WVKK980PM.description: The StoryTale is a fairytale platformer with booms, explodes and shatters, where heroes fight with cursed weapons and tend to forget spells, but, don't worry, nobody gets hurt.

9NMBZ4TFLR12.title: Bump & Run Racing
9NMBZ4TFLR12.description:
Ever miss the good ole' days where you could smash your way to the finish line?  Well look no further! "Bump & Run Racing" is a re-imagination of classic arcade racers that center gameplay around the destruction of your fellow racers.  Earn and burn boost, take down opponents and avoid those pesky pedestrians on your way to the finish line.

*OPTIMIZED FOR XBOX SERIES S/X*

9MXNTDDWLRN8.title: Bassmaster® Fishing 2022: Lake Hartwell
9MXNTDDWLRN8.description: Get ready to take on the monster Lake Hartwell and the most professional bass fishing tournament – The Bassmaster Classic®. It’s time to go head-to-head with the competition and compete in a 3-round final on the Bassmaster® 2022 Classic venue to become the champion and take home the coveted trophy.

9N4V8K7Z5RRG.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master!
9N4V8K7Z5RRG.description:
Drum out high scores by accurately playing along with 2 different notes, Don and Ka, in Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master! Includes over 70 songs, local multiplayer mode, and online ranked matches.
Light your drumming spirit on fire!

9NPN1X7QPJK5.title: Bassmaster® Fishing 2022: Predator Equipment Pack
9NPN1X7QPJK5.description: Become the ultimate predator and dominate the competition! The Predator Equipment Pack will set you up nicely to hunt and fight those lunkers into your boat so you can take your spot on the stage with the biggest bag of bass.

9N7LQV82F11M.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Back to School Costume Pack
9N7LQV82F11M.description:
This costume pack features the 12 members of the Taranis crew in Japanese school attire.
You can modify what the children are wearing under "Change Costumes" in the Options menu.

9NNBPBM2F60W.description: Become an average, everyday deer and stretch your neck out a bit.

9N4K8K2ZGF1L.title: One Step From Eden
9N4K8K2ZGF1L.description: Build a powerful deck, cast spells on the fly, battle evolving enemies, find game-changing artifacts, make friends or make enemies, just make it to Eden.

9P208FP0D4K9.title: Bassmaster® Fishing: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
9P208FP0D4K9.description: Stand out from the crowd with the Deluxe Upgrade content such as the unique Bassmaster® Fishing boat wrap, B.A.S.S.® branded cosmetics & equipment, and your own list of in-game Deluxe Edition challenges, so you can become the ultimate Bassmaster® angler.

9NKXX0ZP7MPJ.title: Lent: The Easter Bunny (Story Three)
9NKXX0ZP7MPJ.description: The humans and animals are preparing for Easter! But one bunny has different plans?! Purchase and play the Lent: The Easter Bunny series today!

9NW4Z3HPJVKW.title: Skul: The Hero Slayer
9NW4Z3HPJVKW.description:
Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. Featuring 90 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging.

The Demon King's Castle in Ruins
The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before. What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'.

Side-Scrolling Platformer Action
'Skul: The Hero Slayer' is an action-platformer that boasts rogue-like features such as everchanging and challenging maps. It will keep you on your toes, as you will never know what to expect.

Tons of skulls, tons of playable characters
Skul is no ordinary skeleton. In addition to his formidable fighting skills, he can gain new and exciting abilities depending on which skull he's wearing. Use up to 2 skulls at a time, each of which has its own unique attack range, speed and power. Choose combos that match your playing style and switch them in the heat of battle to bring your enemies to their knees. The power is in your hands!

The Adventurers
Skul has crossed paths with a party of Adventurers! They are powerful foes that hunt Demons for sport. While Skul may be small, he still packs quite a punch. So just wait and see who really is the hunter and who is the hunted....

Bosses Corrupted by Dark Quartz
At the end of every chapter, go head-to-head with massive bosses corrupted with Dark Quartz and powerful beyond belief. Derived from the pain and hate of life itself, Dark Quartz taints and takes control of everything it touches.

9N8QQ6HZ7G7F.title: Dark Grim Mariupolis (for Windows 10)
9N8QQ6HZ7G7F.description:
Introducing “Dark Grim Mariupolis”, a point'n'click adventure game set in a world, combining noir, Greek mythology, magic, mysticism, hopeless entourage of Greco-Roman Age of Decadence and stifling everyday routine. Encourage yourself and step into darkness…
Enter Mariupolis, a dark place accompanied with confusing, strange music of no visible source. You are some sort of a detective, and therefore you need to investigate, but why? That’s the thing you’re going to find out… or, maybe not. Everything depends on you and sudden whims of Pentaculus, a grim god stretching its hands out over the whole city.
Investigate and solve puzzles, while resisting dark and obscure grasp of Mariupolis, where the only things guarding you from its baneful influence are sarcasm and arrogance. And be aware – your hero might actually die.

9NGCXSWQH505.title: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - JumpShip Edition
9NGCXSWQH505.description: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries JumpShip Edition includes MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries with the year one update and the New Legendary update featuring Melee and Mech Switching, the first DLC Heroes of the Inner Sphere, and The Legend of the Kestrel Lancers Expansion.

9P9XS9D0LBPV.title: Embr
9P9XS9D0LBPV.description:
Team up with friends to become the most über firefighters money can buy. Rush into burning buildings filled with dangerous hazards, valuables, and top-of-the-line security systems. Fight fires, save lives, salvage goods, and make life-changing money. Buy high tech tools with advanced upgrades, and fresh outfits that unlock new ways to play.

Embr will keep you coming back for more with new mission types, daily and weekly challenges, and plenty of achievements to hunt.

9PH779KSQN98.title: Yellow Chess
9PH779KSQN98.description: How would you like to play the standard Chess game with this design? Play a match against the computer and see how fast it plays, maybe you will win?

9P55TJKCL1BC.title: Twelve Minutes
9P55TJKCL1BC.description: An interactive thriller about a man trapped in a time loop. Featuring James McAvoy, Daisy Ridley, and Willem Dafoe.

9PMN56MT3HC5.title: Motorcycle Stunt Racer
9PMN56MT3HC5.description: Gear up and get ready for the ride of your life! Ride your bike through 27 exciting and challenging levels.

9NQ494H131K6.title: Shakes on a Plane
9NQ494H131K6.description: Shakes on a Plane is a chaotic co-op shaking game for one to four players. Flying on various planes with your flight crew, serve up a variety of tasty shakes, burgers, fries and many more dishes before the plane lands on the airport and your passengers rate your services.

9PKZ6GX66VZ4.title: Monster Truck Ramp Adventure
9PKZ6GX66VZ4.description: It's like a Monster Truck Rollercoaster ride! Get ready for a fun filled adventure spread over fifteen levels. Choose your truck or unlock new favorites. Next select your level and compete on the leaderboards for the best time on each.

9NBHQSQ3621M.title: Dodgeball Academia
9NBHQSQ3621M.description: Dodgeball Academia is a sports RPG game featuring rookie dodgeball student, Otto. Join Otto and an eclectic cast of characters as they train to dominate on and off the courts of the academia.

9MX9WN6DBS39.title: Fishing Planet - Golden Starter Pack
9MX9WN6DBS39.description: Not only do you get all the awesome Advanced & Deluxe tackle in their Golden edition, but also the most powerful state-or-the art exclusively Golden fishing equipment! Sound good? How about FULL ACCESS to 17 WATERWAYS in North America and Europe with 30 Day Pond Passes, complemented by all corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses!

9NLX3GWW0HF1.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel
9NLX3GWW0HF1.description:
"We have to fight! If we don't, everyone we love will be taken away!"

One fateful night, a peaceful village is thrown into the flames of war. Determined to save their families, a group of children boards a giant tank and begins an offensive charge!

Fuga: Melodies of Steel is an RPG where you place children, each with their own unique characteristics and skills, at different gun turrets in a tank to fight against the enemy.

Living inside the tank, the children show emotion and gain affinity amongst each other. Manage these both to change the outcome of their journey!

9NVBMF0BJBDM.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Deluxe Edition
9NVBMF0BJBDM.description:
"We have to fight! If we don't, everyone we love will be taken away!"

One fateful night, a peaceful village is thrown into the flames of war. Determined to save their families, a group of children boards a giant tank and begins an offensive charge!

Fuga: Melodies of Steel is an RPG where you place children, each with their own unique characteristics and skills, at different gun turrets in a tank to fight against the enemy.

Living inside the tank, the children show emotion and gain affinity amongst each other. Manage these both to change the outcome of their journey!

9N2FBP5RZX06.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Deluxe Edition Upgrade Pack
9N2FBP5RZX06.description:
*This content is also included in "Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Deluxe Edition". Please be careful to not purchase the content multiple times.

9NW7S04QK7XV.title: The Procession to Calvary
9NW7S04QK7XV.description: The Procession to Calvary is an adventure game in which you journey through a richly detailed landscape built from hundreds of Renaissance paintings.

9NCK543D5BN6.title: Pirate Monkey Run! 2
9NCK543D5BN6.description: Jake and Jade, your favorite pirate monkeys, are on the run again!

9NDRDS21Q8C7.title: Fishing Planet - Deluxe Starter Pack
9NDRDS21Q8C7.description: Skyrocket your angling progress and treat yourself to a truly deluxe fishing experience with the DELUXE STARTER PACK! The DELUXE STARTER PACK features SEVEN powerful Deluxe Edition rod and reel combos, along with superb Deluxe Edition fishing apparel - an all round basic set of superb equipment to cover all your progressive fishing needs! You also get Pond Passes to 10 FISHING DESTINATIONS along with the corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses!

9PLSRQ8B6XL4.title: Worms Rumble - Digital Deluxe Edition
9PLSRQ8B6XL4.description:
Worms Rumble is Worms like you’ve never played it before, with intense, real-time, arena-based 32 player cross-platform combat. Get ready for frantic Deathmatches and intense Last Worm Standing!

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
• Worms Rumble Base Game
• Legends Pack - 6 Outfits – Retro Commando, Sheep, Donkey, Skunk, Cow and Pigeon (each with 3 different colour variants!) 6 Weapon Skins - Retro, Wooly, Concrete, Poison, Bovine, Feathers and 6 Banners

Use a variety of fan-favourite weapons like the Bazooka, Shotgun and Sheep Launcher plus all-new additions to the armoury to bring the pain to your invertebrate opponents as you climb the ranks. Customise your worm, take part in challenges and seasonal events and experiment with new ways to play in The Lab. This is Worms, reinvented.  

The First Real Time Worms! 

You won’t find any turn-based combat in Worms Rumble. Every round is in REAL TIME! If your enemy is raining fire upon you, give them heck right back! 

32 Player Cross Platform Multiplayer 

Play with friends online across console and PC. With Deathmatch and Last Worm Standing solo and squad battle royale modes available at launch! 

Classic Weapons with New Ways to Play 

Arm yourself with new and returning fan-favourite weapons! With classics like the Bazooka, Holy Hand-grenade and Sheep launcher and the all-new Hammerhead, Plasma Blaster and Rocket shield. 

Events, Challenges and ‘The Lab’ 

Take part in seasonal and community events, and daily challenges for additional XP and in-game rewards. And experiment with new gameplay mechanics and weapons in The Lab. Each week brings new experimental game modes with new fun ways to play!

Player Customisations 

Earn XP and in-game currency to unlock and purchase weapon skins, outfits, accessories and emotes! Mix and match to create your own personal style on the battlefield.

9NFT5LFPW5D2.title: SGN Sports Wild Game Hunting
9NFT5LFPW5D2.description:
Collect your gear and let's go hunting. Compete with the best hunters out there. Test your skills with Stag, Rabbit, Boar, Wolf, Eagle, and Duck Hunting. 

Each animal type has ten different challenges. Try for your best score in each. Spend winnings on better and more powerful weapons.

Enjoy the great outdoors, weapon at you side, take aim & fire!

9NSB482N7H9W.title: Pirate Monkey Match
9NSB482N7H9W.description:
Jake and Jade, the Pirate Monkeys, star in their own Match Game. Help Jake and Jade master the 100 levels along the path. 

Match 3 or more candies in a row to clear them. More than three results in a power candy that when matched with two others candies of the same color has a powerful effect. Different levels have different requirements to clear. Match a certain number of candies of a certain color, clear all the sugar, find hidden pineapples, drop ingredients such as bananas and coconut milk, and more.

Clear the boards with less than the allowed or moves, or within the time limit. Fail and you'll have to try again.

9N5ZJMZH71S7.title: Pirate Monkey Fruit Shoot
9N5ZJMZH71S7.description:
Jake and Jade, your favorite Pirate Monkeys, are back in a new puzzle game! Play as either Jake or Jade. Throw balls into the air. If you connect with two or more other balls of the same color they will pop away. Any balls that are not touching other objects will fall away. Some balls have a piece of fruit, these are the object of the game. When they fall or pop, a piece of fruit will parachute down to the ground. Collect the amount of fruit that the level requires to win the level.

Destroying or dropping balls of a certain color will count towards earning a power-up. Watch as the tanks on the left fill up. Once full, they will glow signifying you have earned that power-up.  Make sure you use them as they will disappear at the end of the level. 

Can you help Jake and Jade collect as much fruit as they can?

9N06J05BKJ5V.title: Fishing Planet - Advanced Starter Pack
9N06J05BKJ5V.description: Take your fishing experience to the NEXT LEVEL instantaneously - with the ADVANCED STARTER PACK! The pack features FOUR powerful Advanced Edition rod and reel combos, along with awesome Advanced Edition fishing apparel - an all round basic set of superb equipment to cover all your progressive fishing needs! You also get 7-Day Pond Passes to 5 STATES and 2 European COUNTRIES!

9PB3VHFWB5RV.title: AntVentor
9PB3VHFWB5RV.description: AntVentor is a point & click adventure game. You find yourself in a photorealistic macroworld where you immediately manage to ruin the life of the main character, ant, and foil all his plans for making his dream come true. Can you help get everything back in order?

9NKPFW0MDNL8.title: Gunship Assault
9NKPFW0MDNL8.description:
You're piloting a gunship helicopter on a mission to destroy enemies targets and craft. Watch your radar and long range scanner. Identify targets to destroy to complete your mission. Scout out enemy convoys traversing the terrain. Be on the look out for enemy aircraft such as fighter jets, drones, and even enemy gunships. We are counting on you!

The action is fast and furious. Take charge as you're at the controls to complete these important missions.

** Note:
This game supports leaderboards for fastest completion time. You must complete all missions at a difficulty to post to the leaderboard. For example, complete all 10 Easy missions to post the total time to complete them to the Easy leaderboard.

9P0V3BLGW7NX.title: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark
9P0V3BLGW7NX.description: Delouse your room with sage and pack up your travel-sized ouija board, it’s time to re-enter Twin Lakes - America’s 34th most haunted city. Join Detective McQueen as he puzzles his way through six chilling cases, risking life and pixelated limb to solve the macabre mysteries that plague this poor town.

9NH304JTM1KF.title: Bullet Beat (for Windows 10)

9NRZFG8Q27BF.title: ReactorX (for Windows 10)
9NRZFG8Q27BF.description:
This is a relaxing game about moving boxes on energy grids in a sci-fi setting, in order to repair the space ship which was hit by a meteor.

Features:

- Easy to play, exactly what you need to rest from the dynamics of big games;
- Level-design with no dead ends, so you don't have to restart any level except if you really want to start anew;
- Short animated cutscenes with story elements.

Engine rooms include such elements as:

1. Power grid: it receives the power from the reactors. Each reactor has a distinct shape of routing the energy it contains. Objective of each level is to have every power grid cell filled with energy.
2. Coloring rays: they change the color of the reactor which it touches. Game starts with only red-colored reactors, then proceeds to include yellow-colored, blue-colored and non-colored, which must be first exposed to the coloring rays. Upon going into the coloring ray, player can lose the level.
3. Various obstacles that block the way.

9NRWNJS7JS6H.title: The Darkside Detective
9NRWNJS7JS6H.description: Grab your trench coat, tune your sixth sense and join the Darkside Division as they investigate the outright bizarre, the downright dangerous and the mildly confusing cases of Twin Lakes. Flesh-hungry tentacles, mafian zombies, and the occasional missing sock are no match for The Darkside Detective.

9PGRS6WW78MB.title: Adios
9PGRS6WW78MB.description: A pig farmer decides he no longer wants to dispose of bodies for the mob. What follows is a discussion between you, and the hitman who will have to kill you if he can't convince you to stay.

9PML0BPQ6FH9.title: Cave Quest - Match 3 Adventure
9PML0BPQ6FH9.description: Unravel the mystery of the Ghost King!

9NQ93D6MMCZV.title: Image Vectorizer
9NQ93D6MMCZV.description:
Image vectorizer can convert most image file types (BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, ...) to Vector graphics. Vector graphics are scaleable and do not pixelate at higher zoom levels.

Raster images are created with pixel-based software or captured with a camera or scanner.
One of the main disadvantages is that raster images cannot be resized without losing quality. If the image is magnified enough, its artifacts appear. The halftone dots, film grains, and pixels become apparent. Images of sharp edges become fuzzy or jagged. See, for example, pixelation. Conversely, vector graphics can be scaled to any size without any loss in quality.
vector graphics can be used for logos, page layout, type, line art, or illustrations

9NB4GMT80Z5L.title: Horse Riding (Story Two (A))
9NB4GMT80Z5L.description: It's time for horse riding! Play story mode or race around courses on your horse! It's great fun for all ages!

9NZQ57MWJQQ5.description: This game is inspired by the classic Arcade 'Space Invaders' and the purpose of this game is to destroy all the aliens by moving your battleship from left to right holding and firing your weapon without losing lives.

9MVWCVM23H77.description: In a small village on the edge of the island, a young resident named James leave in search of something. And what is he looking for? He's trying to get to the mountain top before Halloween. He received a letter claiming that if he goes there before Halloween begins, he can bring his parents back from the dead. Is the note correct? 9NXMDCKXDWBP.title: Nexoria: Dungeon Rogue Heroes
9NXMDCKXDWBP.description: This game is a unique mix of rogue-like with dungeon exploration, RPG, turn-based tactics and collectible card game. At the base of the turn-based system are not turns, but time. Find and improve new heroes and get coins to buy new spells. But remember, a hero’s death will be fatal.

9P3DD7NHBHZQ.title: Cinders
9P3DD7NHBHZQ.description:
A mature take on Cinderella that's all about player choices and shaping the famous fairy tale in any way you like. 

Cinders is a witty young woman living with an overbearing stepmother and her two daughters, as if she was reenacting a certain well-known fairy tale. But unlike its protagonist, Cinders is not afraid of taking fate into her own hands. Even if it means breaking the rules...

9NW95RSRMGGZ.title: Nik and Kit (Windows 10 Version)
9NW95RSRMGGZ.description:
Nik & Kit have lost their Bibles and now they have to find them! Who is the person that stole it?


[Game Features]
-Simple game play and controls
-Retro styled graphics and music
-For 1 or 2 players


[This game is recommended for people who enjoy or are looking for...]
-the Nik and Kit series
-a simple, classic styled arcade adventure
-an arcade game with Christian themes
-Christian video games
-Bible based games
-a Christian themed game that anyone can play
-a Christian themed arcade game
-retro pixel art and music
-multiplayer games
-games for one or two players


[About the Nik and Kit series]
Nik and Kit is a series of video games, books, and animations about characters who have lots of adventures while learning about God, themselves, and the world around them! Nik and Kit products are designed for children ages 5 to 10. The series began with the original Nik and Kit video game, released in May 2006, and has continued to this day with many different products!


Learn more about the series, the characters, and find a timeline of story events at our official website: https://www.NikandKit.com


Nik and Kit © 2006-2020 Myron Kevan Tynes Jr. / Breakthrough Gaming

9N8RR4DPK4MX.title: Zippy the Circle (Windows 10 Version)
9N8RR4DPK4MX.description: A shadow appears over Zippy the Circle's home! Zippy must save his family and friends from Jagged, who has taken over his home island!

9PGJ5VXX7RPR.title: Cyber Lemur
9PGJ5VXX7RPR.description: Cyber Lemur is a challenging 2D couch-multiplayer game with a variety of game modes including race, jump, and battle. The controls are difficulty to master, but can be made easier by having two players control the same character. The game is great for parties, or those who love a challenge.

9PKTXKNNVW5K.title: The Surge 1 & 2 - Dual Pack (PC)
9PKTXKNNVW5K.description:
This bundle includes The Surge and The Surge 2’s base game experiences.

The Surge
A catastrophic event has knocked you out during your first day on the job. You wake up, mysteriously equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, and must fight to escape.

The Surge 2
Fight ferocious threats in brutal, unforgiving combat, slashing and tearing the limbs off your opponents to steal their equipment.

9MV6C07GL53C.title: Lent: The Easter Bunny (Story Two)

7. This is not entirely commercial ad, dude, just have a try.

Soar across the beautiful skies of the San Francisco bay area, Las Vegas, and Switzerland.  Flight Unlimited utilizes advanced streaming technology to provide some of the best visuals in flight simulation.

The campaign tasks with you missions such as rescuing a prisoner from Alcatraz, B2 Bomber surveillance over the Swiss Alps, landing your Cessna on the Golden Gate Bridge, and more!

BegatAll is a fantastic way to keep your research and family history safe.  Import your GEDCOM from other popular ancestry tools and save outside of their cloud environment.  BegatAll is a great alternative to paying monthly fees for storage and research access!

Version 5 is a complete genealogy application that provides integration into popular web based research tools, fast lookup, editing, reporting, and more.  BegatAll presents your family history with flowing, "live" tree views and media support for those images that describe your family members unique personality.  BegatAll let's you create more than a written record.

Come join other users in creating an accessible family tree to share with family and friends.  Generate report files that can be opened in any web browser.

9WZDNCRDCP0W.title: World Time Clock and Call Planner
9WZDNCRDCP0W.description:
Quickly see what time it is in your favorite cities around the globe, in a call/meeting planning tool, or on a map. Need to call your subcontractor in Sydney? What time is it there? What is the date? When does Daylight Savings Time change there? Coordinate calls and meeting times with your friends and business partners around the globe using World Time Clock. Easily see simultaneous times (and dialing codes) in the cities you are interested in for the current time and future times/dates. Don’t strain your brain – use this app to plan your calls.

Why this app is different: Simple to use. More functionality for planning calls and meetings.

Choose your own cities, without having to wade through long lists of places you don't care about. You can add places that are important to your list of favorites. 

Customize the labels to make place names meaningful to you. For example, you can change “Rio de Janeiro, RJ ” to “Brazil Sales Office”. 
 
Unlike apps that only show conversions for the current time/date, our straightforward Call Planner gives you an easy-to-read chart of simultaneous times in cities you choose – for right now and for upcoming times/dates. 

Coordinate with international coworkers or friends by copying the call planning times and sharing them in a message to them. 

We provide not only times, dates, and day of week, but also international/country calling codes. 

On Windows 10, you don’t even have to open the app to check the current time in the places that are most relevant to you. With a glance at the live start screen or start menu tiles, you can see the time for up to ten cites of your choosing. (Live start screen time tiles are not available on Windows 11.) 

Calling a small town that isn’t in the built-in database? No problem. Just click on the map to find the nearest city in the region of interest. 

You deserve to get your work done without frustration, with easy-to-use apps. Our primary software developer’s decades of work in user interface design mean that our applications are developed from the ground up with your experience at the heart. 

Download your 7-day free trial of World Time Clock today.

Lee, articula, interactúa, comprende y aprende. 

Juego interactivo y didáctico que ayuda al niño a mejorar su comprensión y habilidad en la lectura, permitiéndole ganar fluidez, corregir problemas de articulación en el habla fortaleciendo su aprendizaje. Este juego incluye cuatro módulos. El módulo principal es para ejercicios de articulación, el cual le ayuda a mejorar el habla, lectura y comprensión. Otro módulo es el audio-cuento, el cual permite que se reproduzcan automáticamente los ejercicios como si fueran cuentos. El tercer módulo es para completar palabras, en el cual el niño tiene que ver la imagen y colocar las letras que falten. El cuarto módulo le permite crear sus propios ejercicios, hechos a la medida de las necesidades del niño.

9P6HS3NF60HC.title: 文字でつたエール -リアルタイム・キーボード字幕-
9P6HS3NF60HC.description:
「文字でつたエール」はビジネス・プライベートを問わず、すべての人の距離を身近にする字幕ツールです。

◆ビデオ通話アプリでキーボードからリアルタイムに字幕をつけることができます。

リアルタイムなビデオ通話の最中にキーボード入力で映像に字幕を付けることができます。

◆PC版のLINEやZOOMで使えます。

PC版のLINEやZOOMのようなビデオ通話アプリで使えます。
仮想カメラ機能に対応しているビデオ通話アプリならどれでも使えます。

◆使い方は簡単です。

「文字でつたエール」を起動後、各ビデオ通話アプリの設定画面を開き、使用するカメラを「OBS Virtual Camera」に変更するだけです。

◆話す・聞くのが困難な方にもビデオ通話ができます。

開発者の私のように病気で話すのが困難な人でもビデオ通話アプリで字幕をつけることで、ミーティング等で自分の意見を簡単に伝えることができます。
また耳が聞こえにくい相手にも字幕を表示させることで気持ちを伝えることができます。

※このアプリはフリーソフトである「OBS Studio」の仮想カメラ機能を使っているので、事前にインストールしておく必要があります。
